Package environment

Class MagicTruffle

java.lang.Object
environment.StationaryModifier
environment.MagicTruffle
public class MagicTruffle extends StationaryModifier
This class serves as a Bonus Reward that increments the same amount of points as MagicCorn but also grants Wilbur invincibility as a bonus for a set amount of time when Wilbur comes into contact with it. All Magic Truffles do not need to be collected to proceed to the next level Holds the image file name Contains constructor for the Magic Truffle
